## BoundingBoxTree.(constructor)

Creates a bounding box tree from an AABB tree

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(aabbtree: AABBTree);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aabbtree | [AABBTree](doc/markdown/./scene.aabbtree.md) | The AABB tree to be copied from |
